additionalInfo.description: Process incoming messages from devices with the alarm rules defined in the device profile. Dispatch all incoming messages with "Success" relation type.

configuration.jsScript: return {msg: msg, metadata: metadata, msgType: msgType};

configuration.tbelScript:
// Parse the 'data' field from the incoming message
var parsedData = msg.data;

var filteredData = {
    AN1: parsedData.AN1,
    AN2: parsedData.AN2,
    AN3: parsedData.AN3,
    AN4: parsedData.AN4,
    AN5: parsedData.AN5,
    AN6: parsedData.AN6,
    DI1: parsedData.DI1,
    DI2: parsedData.DI2,
    M01: parsedData.M01,
    M02: parsedData.M02,
    M03: parsedData.M03,
    M04: parsedData.M04,
    M05: parsedData.M05,
    M06: parsedData.M06,
    M07: parsedData.M07,
    M08: parsedData.M08,
    M09: parsedData.M09,
    M10: parsedData.M10,
    M11: parsedData.M11,
    M12: parsedData.M12,
    M13: parsedData.M13,
    M14: parsedData.M14,
    M15: parsedData.M15,
    M16: parsedData.M16,
    M17: parsedData.M17,
    M18: parsedData.M18,
    M19: parsedData.M19,
    M20: parsedData.M20,
    M21: parsedData.M21,
    M22: parsedData.M22,
    M23: parsedData.M23,
    M24: parsedData.M24,
    M25: parsedData.M25,
    M26: parsedData.M26,
    M27: parsedData.M27,
    M28: parsedData.M28,
    M29: parsedData.M29,
    M30: parsedData.M30,
    M31: parsedData.M31,
    M32: parsedData.M32,
    M33: parsedData.M33,
    M34: parsedData.M34,
    M35: parsedData.M35,
    M36: parsedData.M36,
    M37: parsedData.M37,
    M38: parsedData.M38,
    M39: parsedData.M39,
    M40: parsedData.M40,
    M41: parsedData.M41,
    M42: parsedData.M42,
    M43: parsedData.M43,
    M44: parsedData.M44,
    M45: parsedData.M45,
    M46: parsedData.M46,
    M47: parsedData.M47,
    M48: parsedData.M48,
    M49: parsedData.M49,
    M50: parsedData.M50,
    M51: parsedData.M51,
    M52: parsedData.M52,
    M53: parsedData.M53,
    M54: parsedData.M54,
    M55: parsedData.M55,
    M56: parsedData.M56,
    M57: parsedData.M57,
    M58: parsedData.M58,
    M59: parsedData.M59,
    M60: parsedData.M60,
    offread: parsedData.offread,
    offwrite: parsedData.offwrite,
    queueSt: parsedData.queueSt,
    version: parsedData.version,
    firstSetup: parsedData.firstSetup,
    EQUIP_CONDITION: parsedData.EQUIP_CONDITION,
    DEVICE_STATUS: parsedData.DEVICE_STATUS,
    HOUR_METER: parsedData.HOUR_METER,
    GPS_LOCATION: parsedData.GPS_LOCATION,
    GPS_SPEED: parsedData.GPS_SPEED,
    SUPPLY_VOLTAGE: parsedData.SUPPLY_VOLTAGE,
    SIGNAL_STRENGTH: parsedData.SIGNAL_STRENGTH
};

return { msg: filteredData, metadata: metadata, msgType: msgType };
